website_summaries.verdict: Increases circulation using unique, natural ingredients.
pros: Cleans skin and provides therapeutic elements using mud from the Deep Sea
3.4 ounces and a good choice for men and women
cons: The Deep Sea Mud can be too harsh for some sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Erno Laszlo Sea Mud Soap
customer_reviews.text: I was a VP for Erno Laszlo from 1990 to 2002 and just ordered a bar of Sea Mud Soap and was shocked to see that the bar is at least half the size as we used to sell and the price is double ???? Beautiful skin care line but the reduction in size is ridiculous .
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K. Coffin

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product... I have been using it since I was 14 years old.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough positive about the performance of this soap... but I am disappointed that the new management of the company has decided to shrink the size and raise the price.
customer_reviews.author: D.Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reduced the size and its cleaning power. Old one was better
customer_reviews.author: Armando A. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap but sorry Erno Laszlo has made it smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great soap and wonderful for the skin. I have been using it for 20 years. I was a bit surprised to find the soap to be the same size and same price but half the width or height should I say. This is the only reason I'm making it four stars otherwise I would give it a five.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for acne
customer_reviews.text: This soap keep my face clear, I started breaking out with itchy acne as an adult and this clears my face right up and keep my skin looking young
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Brin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 50 years. I love it. It keeps my face clean and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Claire L. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: I have Oily skin and this works great, high$$$ though
customer_reviews.text: I like how my skin feels after washing with this soap. My skin is clearer and pores seem refined. But, it is costly, and doesn't seem to last long.
customer_reviews.author: ladyinred

customer_reviews.title: Spa Experience in A Bar
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this soap. If you were a fan of Borghese’s Sea Mud Mask, you will love this soap. Not only does it remove make-up but it doesn’t leave your skin feeling stripped. Leaves skin silky smooth. The travel style packaging is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: denise p.

customer_reviews.title: It broke in half!!
customer_reviews.text: My bar broke in half last night as I was using a corner on my cheek. I've been using this product for several years and never had this experience. A little pricey for this to happen.....
customer_reviews.author: PJA

customer_reviews.title: Not seal wrapping
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cleanser for oily skin. been using it for couple years (did switch brands in between), now the size of this bar has been shrinked a little bit. This is my first time buying it from Amazon. It's great price during the lightening deal, i wanted to get it as a present. But then I got disappointed by the packaging since there's no clear sealed wrap like the ones from dept store. I guess the products r the same. It's great deal for Self use, but if as gift, it's better getting it from the counter.
customer_reviews.author: lkc216

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this soap for thirty years!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this soap for thirty years! Even at 71 my skin is oily and sea mud cleanses thoroughly without harming my skin. I recommend it for teenagers with acne.
customer_reviews.author: cathy phegley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t skimp on your skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product since 1984. When I fall off the wagon and use a different product- my skin gets dry and dull. The gentle exfoliating sands brighten my skin and keep my skin clear
customer_reviews.author: Cary Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior and have used this since my 30s. No one has even been able to come close to guessing my age. Also have history of rosacea out breaks but none when using this. Also no residue left and face feels soft after washing
customer_reviews.author: Patricia w  Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 2 nights and experienced major skin breakout.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and refreshs
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face feeling clean and oil free plus just refresh
customer_reviews.author: cathyfbrown

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaning and non drying soap I have ever used. I feel insane for paying this much for a bar of soap but after using the sample in my last Allure box I knew it was worth it. Repeat customer for life whenever I can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's because Jackie O used it and because it's mentioned in a Woody Allen movie but I love this soap. My skin does seem to feel soft and nourished. I use it with a Clarisonic day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Kara J Buller

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok, saw this in an issue of GQ magazine and although I do not have acne/skin problems, I just wanted to clear my skin a little more. Seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and this doesn’t irritate it at all. My skin is so soft and it reduces acne and pores
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Paskowski

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 2 years. My skin got cleaner, and feel so good every time using it. It definitely better than other cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: Yu An Chen

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Gentle. Essential.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for many years. Don't know what I'd do without it. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin this works for bumps and blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I finally found products that work on my oily skin. For years i couldn’t find something that work. I will use this with the cleanser and toner products forever!
customer_reviews.author: flower

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: You can see and fill differences after you use this.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Jackie O go to soap!
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels so soft after using it. Also I read in Vanity Fare this was Jackie O favorite face soap!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Soap
customer_reviews.text: Loves this product and has been using for 25 plus years. It brightens your skin, clear dark spots and it stops acne.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Erno Lazlo skincare is amazing and the charcoal soup is excellent for deep cleaning and detoxifying.
customer_reviews.author: Dixee Darling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This soap is a miracle for sensitive, acne prone skin
customer_reviews.author: Donna Orender

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 20 years. I love it. It lasts a long time. I've strayed from time to time, but there is no replacement. I always come back.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie D.

customer_reviews.title: Love EL Sea Mud Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Love Erno Laszlo Sea Mud soap! Great price. I will definately reorder.
customer_reviews.author: KTG

customer_reviews.text: Really helps to keep my young oily skin clear of acne
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Have used this soap for over 40 years! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: johanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The best been use it for 30 years .i do have beautiful skin !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mabilia malta

customer_reviews.title: This i snot the product you remember
customer_reviews.text: Not what it used to bem This product has changed, and not for the better.
customer_reviews.author: HRH Pupule

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I’ve been using it for 30 years. I believe it has kept aging down to a slow crawl.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie.

customer_reviews.title: Great product just not the size they used to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product just not the size they used to be when I was growing up. Standard soap size...probably won’t reorder due to the price and size received. I am used to a chunky soap bar the EL used to market.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Schonewitz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the soap, hate the black run off that gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Leather bag
customer_reviews.text: The leather bag is high quality The price was in the money. I will definitely order from this seller again. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Erno Laszlo Sea Mud Deep Cleansing Bar, 3.4 oz
product_meta.description:
Go deep. Our iconic Laszlo-original Cleansing Bar boasts the uniquely therapeutic benefits of Dead Sea mud, a mineral-rich miracle of nature, to deeply detoxify, exfoliate and hydrate skin. Perfect for blemished or stressed out complexions, this circulation-boosting bar leaves skin soft, smooth and radiant thanks to:

• Dead Sea Mud: Boasting 26 minerals and its signature black color that transforms to white foam—to protect and restore skin’s own mineral levels.
• Glycerin: A powerful moisture magnet, to attract and hold hydration for a more moisturized, glowing complexion.
• Palm & Palm Kernel Oils: Help regulate skin’s own oil content while reinforcing its defenses against outside stressors, as it ramps up cell turnover beneath the surface.

Ideal for these Skin Types:

• Combination Skin
• Oily Skin
• Acne-Prone Skin

Benefits:

• Exfoliates and Detoxifies the skin
• Tightens pores and draws out impurities
• Paraben-Free
• Sulfate-Free
• Phthalate-Free
• Mineral Oil-Free
• Petroleum-Free
• Alcohol-Free

Key Ingredients: Dead Sea Mud & Charcoal

How to use: Use in conjunction with the cleansing oil of your choice. Dip the cleansing bar into water and gently massage wet bar over oiled face. Massage the face with fingertips to create a rich lather. Rinse and pat dry. Use AM & PM, 2x a day.

BRAND STORY
Since 1927, Erno Laszlo has helped women around the world attain beautiful skin with bespoke cleansing rituals and custom skincare solutions.
